member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1
member.summary: A framework element that permits a binding to be evaluated in a new data context leaf node.
member.typeparam: The type of dynamic binding to return.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1._binding
member.summary: Gets or sets the string value binding used by the control.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.ValueProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Value dependency property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BindingEvaluator class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.#ctor(System.Windows.Data.Binding)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BindingEvaluator class, setting the initial binding to the provided parameter.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.ClearDataContext
member.summary: Clears the data context so that the control does not keep a reference to the last-looked up item.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.GetDynamicValue(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates the data context of the framework element and returns the updated binding value.
member.param: The object to use as the data context.
If set to true, this parameter will clear the data context immediately after retrieving the value.
member.returns: Returns the evaluated T value of the bound dependency property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.GetDynamicValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Updates the data context of the framework element and returns the updated binding value.
member.param: The object to use as the data context.
member.returns: Returns the evaluated T value of the bound dependency property.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the data item string value.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.BindingEvaluator`1.ValueBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets the value binding.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper
member.summary: The InteractionHelper provides controls with support for all of the common interactions like mouse movement, mouse clicks, key presses, etc., and also incorporates proper event semantics when the control is disabled.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.SequentialClickThresholdInMilliseconds
member.summary: The threshold used to determine whether two clicks are temporally local and considered a double click (or triple, quadruple, etc.). 500 milliseconds is the default double click value on Windows. This value would ideally be pulled form the system settings.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.SequentialClickThresholdInPixelsSquared
member.summary: The threshold used to determine whether two clicks are spatially local and considered a double click (or triple, quadruple, etc.) in pixels squared. We use pixels squared so that we can compare to the distance delta without taking a square root.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper._updateVisualState
member.summary: Reference used to call UpdateVisualState on the base class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.#ctor(System.Windows.Controls.Control)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the InteractionHelper class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.UpdateVisualState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update the visual state of the control.
member.param: A value indicating whether to automatically generate transitions to the new state, or instantly transition to the new state.
member.remarks: UpdateVisualState works differently than the rest of the injected functionality. Most of the other events are overridden by the calling class which calls Allow, does what it wants, and then calls Base. UpdateVisualState is the opposite because a number of the methods in InteractionHelper need to trigger it in the calling class. We do this using the IUpdateVisualState internal interface.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.UpdateVisualStateBase(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update the visual state of the control.
member.param: A value indicating whether to automatically generate transitions to the new state, or instantly transition to the new state.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.OnLoaded(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handle the control's Loaded event.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.OnIsEnabledChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handle changes to the control's IsEnabled property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.OnApplyTemplateBase
member.summary: Update the visual state of the control when its template is changed.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.Control
member.summary: Gets the control the InteractionHelper is targeting.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.IsFocused
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the control has focus.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.IsMouseOver
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the mouse is over the control.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.IsPressed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the mouse button is pressed down over the control.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.LastClickTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the last time the control was clicked.
member.remarks: The value is stored as Utc time because it is slightly more performant than converting to local time.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.LastClickPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the mouse position of the last click.
member.remarks: The value is relative to the control.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.InteractionHelper.ClickCount
member.summary: Gets the number of times the control was clicked.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.IUpdateVisualState
member.summary: The IUpdateVisualState interface is used to provide the InteractionHelper with access to the type's UpdateVisualState method.

member.summary: Update the visual state of the control.
member.param: A value indicating whether to automatically generate transitions to the new state, or instantly transition to the new state.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.VisualStates.GoToState(System.Windows.Controls.Control,System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Use VisualStateManager to change the visual state of the control.
member.param: Control whose visual state is being changed.
A value indicating whether to use transitions when updating the visual state, or to snap directly to the new visual state.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.VisualStates.TryGetVisualStateGroup(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.String)
member.summary: This method tries to get the named VisualStateGroup for the dependency object. The provided object's ImplementationRoot will be looked up in this call.
member.returns: Returns null or the VisualStateGroup object.

member.summary: Checks to see if the control has focus currently.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating whether the control or its popup have focus.

member.summary: Provides class handling for the GotFocus event.

member.summary: Provides handling for the LostFocus event.

member.summary: Handle the change of the IsEnabled property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnPopupClosedStateChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.VisualStateChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Actually closes the popup after the VSM state animation completes.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TryGetSelectionAdapter(System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to return an ISelectionAdapter wrapper for a specified object.
member.returns: Returns an IItemsSelector wrapping the value.
member.remarks:
The specified object will be returned if it implements ISelectionAdapter. If the specified object can be placed in a known implementation of ISelectionAdapter, one containing the specified object will be returned. Otherwise null will be returned.
Custom adapters can be added by deriving a new control from AutoCompleteBox and overriding the TryGetSelectionAdapter method.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopulateDropDown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the timer tick when using a populate delay.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnPopulating(System.Windows.Controls.PopulatingEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the Populating event when the AutoCompleteBox is populating the selection adapter with suggestions based on the text property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnPopulated(System.Windows.Controls.PopulatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the Populated event when the AutoCompleteBox has populated the selection adapter with suggestions based on the text property.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnSelectionChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the SelectionChanged event when the selected item has changed.

member.param: Provides any observers the opportunity to cancel the operation and halt opening the drop down.

member.summary: Raises an DropDownOpened event when the IsDropDownOpen property changed from false to true.

member.summary: Raises the TextChanged event when the text has changed.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnTextBoxTextChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.TextChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handle the TextChanged event that is directly attached to the TextBox part. This ensures that only user initiated actions will result in an AutoCompleteBox suggestion and operation.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnTextBoxSelectionChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: When selection changes, save the location of the selection start.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.UpdateTextValue(System.String)
member.summary: Updates both the text box value and underlying text dependency property value if and when they change. Automatically fires the text changed events when there is a change.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.UpdateTextValue(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Updates both the text box value and underlying text dependency property value if and when they change. Automatically fires the text changed events when there is a change.
member.param: A nullable bool value indicating whether the action was user initiated. In a user initiated mode, the underlying text dependency property is updated. In a non-user interaction, the text box value is updated. When user initiated is null, all values are updated.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TextUpdated(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handle the update of the text for the control from any source, including the TextBox part and the Text dependency property.
member.param: A value indicating whether the update is a user-initiated action. This should be a True value when the TextUpdated method is called from a TextBox event handler.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopulateComplete
member.summary: Notifies AutoCompleteBox that ItemsSource has been populated and suggestions can now be computed using that data.
member.remarks: Allows a developer to continue the population event after setting the Cancel property to True. This allows for custom, developer-driven AutoCompleteBox scenarios.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.UpdateTextCompletion(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs text completion, if enabled, and a lookup on the underlying item values for an exact match. Will update the SelectedItem value.
member.param: A value indicating whether the operation was user initiated. Text completion will not be performed when not directly initiated by the user.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TryGetMatch(System.String,System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection{System.Object},System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchPredicate{System.String})
member.summary: Attempts to look through the view and locate the specific exact text match.
member.param: The predicate to use for the partial or exact match.
member.returns: Returns the object or null.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ClearView
member.summary: A simple helper method to clear the view and ensure that a view object is always present and not null.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.RefreshView
member.summary: Walks through the items enumeration. Performance is not going to be perfect with the current implementation.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnItemsSourceChanged(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Handle any change to the ItemsSource dependency property, update the underlying ObservableCollection view, and set the selection adapter's ItemsSource to the view if appropriate.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ItemsSourceCollectionChanged(System.Object,System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Method that handles the ObservableCollection.CollectionChanged event for the ItemsSource property.
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnAdapterSelectionChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the SelectionChanged event of the selection adapter.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnAdapterSelectionComplete(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Commit event on the selection adapter.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnAdapterSelectionCanceled(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the Cancel event on the selection adapter.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnMaxDropDownHeightChanged(System.Double)
member.summary: Handles MaxDropDownHeightChanged by re-arranging and updating the popup arrangement.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OpenDropDown(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Private method that directly opens the popup, checks the expander button, and then fires the Opened event.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.CloseDropDown(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Private method that directly closes the popup, flips the Checked value, and then fires the Closed event.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopupChild_GotFocus(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: The popup child has received focus.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopupChild_LostFocus(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: The popup child has lost focus.

member.summary: The popup child has had the mouse enter its bounds.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopupChild_MouseLeave(System.Object,System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: The mouse has left the popup child's bounds.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopupChild_SizeChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: The size of the popup child has changed.

member.summary: The mouse has clicked outside of the popup.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ArrangePopup
member.summary: Arrange the drop down popup.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ToggleDropDown(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary: Toggles the drop down visibility. If visible, the text updated method will be called, eventually refreshing the selection adapter's view and making the appropriate visibility call on the drop down. If no items are in the filtered view, the drop down will not be displayed.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Provides class handling for the KeyDown event that occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnTextBoxKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Occurs when the KeyDown event fires and the drop down is not open.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OnDropDownKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the DropDownKeyDown event when a key down event occurs when the drop down is open.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.System#Windows#Controls#IUpdateVisualState#UpdateVisualState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update the visual state of the control.
member.param: A value indicating whether to automatically generate transitions to the new state, or instantly transition to the new state.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.UpdateVisualState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update the current visual state of the button.
member.param: True to use transitions when updating the visual state, false to snap directly to the new visual state.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.Items
member.summary: Gets or sets a local cached copy of the items data.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.View
member.summary: Gets or sets the observable collection that contains references to all of the items in the generated view of data that is provided to the selection-style control adapter.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.IgnoreTextPropertyChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to ignore a number of pending change handlers. The value is decremented after each use. This is used to reset the value of properties without performing any of the actions in their change handlers.
member.remarks: The int is important as a value because the TextBox TextChanged event does not immediately fire, and this will allow for nested property changes to be ignored.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.IgnorePropertyChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore calling a pending change handlers.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.IgnoreTextSelectionChange
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to ignore the selection changed event.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.SkipSelectedItemTextUpdate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip the text update processing when the selected item is updated.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TextSelectionStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the last observed text box selection start location.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.UserCalledPopulate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user initiated the current populate call.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopupClosedVisualState
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a visual popup state is being used in the current template for the Closed state. Setting this value to true will delay the actual setting of Popup.IsOpen to false until after the visual state's transition for Closed is complete.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.DelayTimer
member.summary: Gets or sets the DispatcherTimer used for the MinimumPopulateDelay condition for auto completion.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.AllowWrite
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a read-only dependency property change handler should allow the value to be set. This is used to ensure that read-only properties cannot be changed via SetValue, etc.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.Interaction
member.summary: Gets or sets the helper that provides all of the standard interaction functionality. Making it internal for subclass access.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ValueBindingEvaluator
member.summary: Gets or sets the BindingEvaluator, a framework element that can provide updated string values from a single binding.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.MinimumPrefixLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum text length before the AutoCompleteBox can display suggestions.
member.remarks: The default MinimumPrefixLength value is 1 character. Valid integers range from -1 to any reasonable maximum. -1 effectively disables the AutoCompleteBox functionality of the control.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.MinimumPopulateDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum delay required, in milliseconds, before the AutoCompleteBox control will lookup and provide suggestions for the current Text.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.IsTextCompletionEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first suggestion found during a lookup will be automatically displayed in the TextBox.
member.remarks: Additionally, performs a lookup for the associated item value belonging to the first suggestion.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the DataTemplate used to display each item in the drop down.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ItemContainerStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Style that is applied to the selection adapter.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TextBoxStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Style that is applied to the TextBox.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.MaxDropDownHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum drop down height.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.IsDropDownOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drop down is open.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection that is used to generate the content of the control.
member.remarks: AutoCompleteBox does not properly support the INotifyCollectionChanged interface. Directly set ItemsSource to a new value if the source data has changed.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.SelectedItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected item's value.
member.remarks: The IsTextCompletionEnabled property of the control impacts the SelectedItem behavior: if the property is set to false, and the user enters a valid items' textual representation, without selection, the SelectedItem value will be null. The lookup between text and items is only done when the IsTextCompletionEnabled property is true (the default value). This is the same behavior that the ComboBox control has in WPF.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the contents of the TextBox.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.SearchText
member.summary: Gets the text value used to search. This is a read-only dependency property.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.SearchMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the built-in, predefined search mode to use for searching the ItemsSource.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ItemFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets a search filter that determines whether an item object is a valid suggestion given the search string.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TextFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets a search filter that determines whether a string is a valid suggestion given the search text.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.DropDownToggleButton
member.summary: Gets or sets the template's ToggleButton part.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.DropDownPopup
member.summary: Gets or sets the drop down popup control.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TextBox
member.summary: Gets or sets the Text template part.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.SelectionAdapter
member.summary: Gets or sets the adapter that represents a selection control. Now internal or protected so that automation peers and derived classes can access it.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopupChild
member.summary: Gets or sets the popup child content.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.OutsidePopupCanvas
member.summary: Gets or sets the expansive area outside of the popup.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.PopupChildCanvas
member.summary: Gets or sets the canvas for the popup child.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.TextChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the text changes.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.Populating
member.summary: Occurs when the AutoCompleteBox is populating the selection adapter with suggestions based on the text property.
member.remarks: If Canceled, the control will not continue the automatic suggestion process, which will be left to the handler.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.Populated
member.summary: Occurs when the AutoCompleteBox has populated the selection adapter with suggestions based on the text property.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.DropDownOpening
member.summary: Occurs when the IsDropDownOpen property is changing from false to true. The event can be cancelled.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.DropDownOpened
member.summary: Occurs when the IsDropDownOpen property was changed from false to true.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.DropDownClosing
member.summary: Occurs when the IsDropDownOpen property is changing from true to false. The event can be cancelled.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.DropDownClosed
member.summary: Occurs when the IsDropDownOpen property was changed from true to false.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the selected item has changed.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.IsEditable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the content is editable. The default Silverlight Toolkit AutoCompleteBox is always editable.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteBox.ValueMemberBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets the string value binding for item-to-string value conversions.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode
member.summary: Represents the different types of built-in search modes available to the AutoCompleteBox control.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.None
member.summary: No search mode, all elements in a collection will be included in the results. This value would be used for a data source.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.StartsWith
member.summary: Matches the text value to start of the string, a current culture case insensitive comparison is used.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.StartsWithCaseSensitive
member.summary: Matches the text value to start of the string, the current culture comparison is used.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.StartsWithOrdinal
member.summary: Matches the text value to start of the string, an ordinal comparison is used.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.StartsWithOrdinalCaseSensitive
member.summary: Matches the text value to start of the string, an ordinal, case insensitive comparison is used.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.Contains
member.summary: Matches the text value if it is contained inside the string, a case insensitive comparison is used. Uses the current culture value.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.ContainsCaseSensitive
member.summary: Matches the text value if it is contained inside the string. Uses the current culture, case-sensitive comparison.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.ContainsOrdinal
member.summary: Matches the text value if it is contained inside the string. Uses an ordinal comparison.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.ContainsOrdinalCaseSensitive
member.summary: Matches the text value if it is contained inside the string. Uses an ordinal comparison that is case-sensitive.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.Equals
member.summary: Matches that the text if it's value equals the string, the current culture, case insensitive comparison is used.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.EqualsCaseSensitive
member.summary: Matches that the text if it's value equals the string using the current culture's case sensitive comparison operator.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.EqualsOrdinal
member.summary: Matches that the text if it's value equals the string using an ordinal case insensitive comparison operator.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.EqualsOrdinalCaseSensitive
member.summary: Matches that the text if it's value equals the string using an ordinal case sensitive comparison operator.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchMode.Custom
member.summary: Custom search mode: setting any of the item or text delegate dependency properties and this value will enable non-standard, custom functions and lambdas to be used.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.AutoCompleteSearchPredicate`1
member.summary: Represents a method that filters items and determines whether they are valid suggestions given the search parameter.
member.param: The string representation of the current item being evaluated by the predicate.
member.typeparam: Whether the predicate will operate on object or string values.
member.returns: Returns true if the item should be included as a suggestion given the search term.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Extensions
member.summary: This set of internal extension methods provide general solutions and utilities in a small enough number to not warrant a dedicated extension methods class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Extensions.Invert(System.Windows.Media.Matrix,System.Windows.Media.Matrix@)
member.summary: Inverts a Matrix. The Invert functionality on the Matrix type is internal to the framework only. Since Matrix is a struct, an out parameter must be presented.
member.param: The matrix to return by an output parameter.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating whether the type was successfully inverted. If the determinant is 0.0, then it cannot be inverted and the original instance will remain untouched.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.Extensions.Contains(System.String,System.String,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: An implementation of the Contains member of string that takes in a string comparison. The traditional .NET string Contains member uses StringComparison.Ordinal.
member.param: The string value to search for.
member.returns: Returns true when the substring is found.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.VisualTreeExtensions
member.summary: A static class providing methods for working with the visual tree.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualChildren(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Retrieves all the visual children of a framework element.
member.returns: The visual children of the framework element.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.VisualTreeExtensions.GetLogicalChildrenBreadthFirst(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Retrieves all the logical children of a framework element using a breadth-first search. A visual element is assumed to be a logical child of another visual element if they are in the same namescope. For performance reasons this method manually manages the queue instead of using recursion.
member.returns: The logical children of the framework element.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.AutoComplete_OnMaxDropDownHeightPropertyChanged_InvalidValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid maximum drop down height value '{0}'. The value must be greater than or equal to zero..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.AutoComplete_OnMinimumPopulateDelayPropertyChanged_InvalidValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid MinimumPopulateDelay value '{0}'. The value must be greater than or equal to zero..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.AutoComplete_OnSearchModePropertyChanged_InvalidValue

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot set read-only property SearchText..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.RoutedPropertyChangingEventArgs_CancelSet_InvalidOperation
